mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE, B.DEPT_NAME, C.JOB_NAME, A.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER A JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE JOIN TBL_JOB C ON A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT ( MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE ) VALUES ( #{ memberCode }, #{ reportType }, #{ reportTitle }, #{ reportInfo }, #{ reportCycle } )
INSERT INTO TBL_FILE ( FILE_NAME, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, REPORT_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ fileName }, #{fileOriginName}, #{ fileSize }, #{ filePath }, #{ reportCode } )
INSERT INTO TBL_REPORTER ( REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ reportCode }, #{ listItem } );
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE, REG_DATE, READ_STATUS, COMPLETION_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ searchConditions.memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = #{ searchConditions.reportType } AND COMPLETION_STATUS = #{ searchConditions.completionStatus } ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit }

SELECT A.REPORT_CODE, A.MEMBER_CODE, A.REPORT_TYPE, A.REPORT_TITLE, A.REPORT_INFO, A.REPORT_CYCLE, A.REG_DATE, A.READ_STATUS, A.COMPLETION_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode } -- AND A.REPORT_TYPE = 'Casual'
SELECT REPORT_CODE FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = 'Routine' AND COMPLETION_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode } UNION ALL SELECT B.MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_REPORTER B WHERE B.REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode }
SELECT FILE_CODE, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, REPORT_CODE FROM TBL_FILE WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode }

SELECT REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE, REG_DATE, READ_STATUS, COMPLETION_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = 'Casual' ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT 20
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_FILE WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode }
DELETE FROM TBL_REPORTER WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode };
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT_ROUND ( REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, CAPACITY ) VALUES ( #{ reportCode }, #{ roundTitle }, #{roundBody }, #{ capacity } )
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND_CODE, REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, REG_DATE, CAPACITY FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ searchCondition } ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit }
SELECT ROUND_CODE, REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, REG_DATE, CAPACITY FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode } ORDER BY ROUND_CODE DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ROUND_CODE, REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, REG_DATE, CAPACITY FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE ROUND_CODE = #{ roundCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE ROUND_CODE = #{ roundCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT_DETAIL ( ROUND_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, DETAIL_BODY ) VALUES ( #{ roundCode }, #{ memberCode }, #{ detailBody } )
mapper.select: SELECT DETAIL_CODE, ROUND_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, DETAIL_BODY, REG_DATE FROM TBL_REPORT_DETAIL WHERE ROUND_CODE = #{ roundCode } ORDER BY DETAIL_CODE DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = #{ detailCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT_ROUND_REPLY ( ROUND_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPLY_BODY ) VALUES ( #{ roundCode }, #{ memberCode }, #{ replyBody } )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_CODE, ROUND_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPLY_BODY, REG_DATE FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND_REPLY WHERE ROUND_CODE = #{ roundCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND_REPLY WHERE REPLY_CODE = #{ replyCode }
